question.string: Which singles did Slayer release?
question.query: PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> SELECT DISTINCT ?album ?title WHERE { ?album foaf:maker ?artist . ?artist foaf:name 'Slayer'. ?album mo:release_type mo:single . ?album dc:title ?title . }

question.string: Which groups was David Bowie a member of?
question.query: PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> SELECT DISTINCT ?band ?bandname WHERE { ?artist foaf:name 'David Bowie' . ?artist mo:member_of ?band . ?band foaf:name ?bandname . }

question.string: When was the band Dover founded?
question.query: PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX bio: <http://purl.org/vocab/bio/0.1/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT DISTINCT ?date WHERE { ?artist rdf:type mo:MusicGroup . ?artist foaf:name 'Dover'. ?artist bio:event ?event . ?event rdf:type bio:Birth . ?event bio:date ?date . }

question.string: How many albums did Michael Jackson record?
question.query: PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ?albumtitle) WHERE { ?album dc:title ?albumtitle . ?album foaf:maker ?artist . ?artist foaf:name 'Michael Jackson' . }

question.string: Who composed the Star Wars soundtrack?
question.query: PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> SELECT DISTINCT ?composer ?name WHERE { ?album mo:release_type mo:soundtrack . ?album dc:title ?title . ?album mo:composer ?composer . ?composer foaf:name ?name. FILTER regex(str(?title),"Star Wars") }

question.string: Which artists have their 50th birthday on May 30, 2012?
question.query: PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX bio: <http://purl.org/vocab/bio/0.1/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT DISTINCT ?artist ?artistname WHERE { ?artist foaf:name ?artistname . ?artist bio:event ?event . ?event rdf:type bio:Birth . ?event bio:date "1962-05-30"^^xsd:dateTime . }

question.string: Give me the present members of The Cure.
question.query: PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX event: <http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#> PREFIX tl: <http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/timeline.owl#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT DISTINCT ?member ?name WHERE { ?band foaf:name 'The Cure' . ?member foaf:name ?name . ?event rdf:type mo:membership . ?event event:agent ?member . ?event mo:group ?band . OPTIONAL { ?event event:time ?time . ?time tl:end ?enddate . } FILTER (!bound(?enddate)) }

question.string: Give me all Kraftwerk albums!
question.query: PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT DISTINCT ?album ?albumtitle WHERE { ?album rdf:type mo:Record . ?album mo:release_type mo:album . ?album dc:title ?albumtitle . ?album foaf:maker ?artist . ?artist foaf:name 'Kraftwerk' . }

question.string: How many bands are called Nirvana?
question.query: PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ?artist) WHERE { ?artist rdf:type mo:MusicGroup . ?artist foaf:name 'Nirvana' . }

question.string: When did the Sex Pistols break up?
question.query: PREFIX bio: <http://purl.org/vocab/bio/0.1/> PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT DISTINCT ?date WHERE { ?artist foaf:name 'Sex Pistols'. ?artist bio:event ?event . ?event rdf:type bio:Death . ?event bio:date ?date . }

question.string: Was Quee MacArthur a member of Queen?
question.query: PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> ASK WHERE { ?artist foaf:name 'Quee MacArthur' . ?artist mo:member_of ?band . ?band foaf:name 'Queen' . }

question.string: When is the birthday of Tom Waits?
question.query: PREFIX bio: <http://purl.org/vocab/bio/0.1/> PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT DISTINCT ?date WHERE { ?artist foaf:name 'Tom Waits'. ?artist bio:event ?event . ?event rdf:type bio:Birth . ?event bio:date ?date . }

question.string: Which artists were born on the 29th of December 1960?
question.query: PREFIX bio: <http://purl.org/vocab/bio/0.1/> PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT DISTINCT ?artist ?name WHERE { ?artist rdf:type mo:SoloMusicArtist . ?artist foaf:name ?name . ?artist bio:event ?event . ?event rdf:type bio:Birth . ?event bio:date "1960-12-29"^^xsd:dateTime . }

question.string: How many bands broke up in 2010?
question.query: PREFIX bio: <http://purl.org/vocab/bio/0.1/> PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ?artist) WHERE { ?artist rdf:type mo:MusicGroup . ?artist bio:event ?event . ?event rdf:type bio:Death . { ?event bio:date ?date . FILTER ( ?date <= "2010-12-31"^^xsd:date && ?date >= "2010-01-01"^^xsd:date ) } UNION { ?event bio:date ?date . FILTER regex (?date,"2010") } }

question.string: Give me all albums with the BBC Symphony Orchestra.
question.query: PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT DISTINCT ?album ?title WHERE { ?album rdf:type mo:Record . ?album mo:performingOrchestra ?orchestra . ?orchestra foaf:name 'BBC Symphony Orchestra' . ?album dc:title ?title . }

question.string: Give me all bands that Michael Stipe is a member of.

question.string: Are there members of the Ramones that are not called Ramone?

question.string: When did Pete Best leave The Beatles?
question.query: PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX event: <http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#> PREFIX tl: <http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/timeline.owl#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT DISTINCT ?date WHERE { ?artist foaf:name 'Pete Best' . ?event rdf:type mo:membership . ?event event:agent ?artist . ?event mo:group ?band . ?band foaf:name 'The Beatles' . ?event event:time ?time . ?time tl:end ?date . }

question.string: Which artists died on the same day as Elvis?
question.query: PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX bio: <http://purl.org/vocab/bio/0.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT DISTINCT ?artist_2 ?artist_2_name WHERE { ?artist foaf:name 'Elvis Presley' . ?artist bio:event ?event . ?event rdf:type bio:Death . ?event bio:date ?date . ?artist_2 rdf:type mo:SoloMusicArtist . ?artist_2 foaf:name ?artist_2_name . ?artist_2 bio:event ?event_2 . ?event_2 rdf:type bio:Death . ?event_2 bio:date ?date . FILTER (!sameTerm(?artist_2,?artist)) }

question.string: Which singles did the Dead Kennedys release?
question.query: PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT DISTINCT ?single ?title WHERE { ?artist rdf:type mo:MusicArtist . ?artist foaf:name 'Dead Kennedys' . ?single mo:release_type mo:single . ?single foaf:maker ?artist . ?single dc:title ?title . }

question.string: Is Liz Story a person or a group?

question.string: Who was Frank Sinatra married to?
question.query: PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX rel: <http://purl.org/vocab/relationship/> SELECT DISTINCT ?artist ?name WHERE { ?artist rel:spouseOf ?spouse . ?artist foaf:name 'Frank Sinatra' . ?spouse foaf:name ?name . }

question.string: Which members of the Beatles are dead?

FILTER (bound(?event)) }

question.string: Which bands were founded in 2010?

FILTER (?date <= '2010-12-31'^^xsd:date && ?date >= '2010-01-01'^^xsd:date) } UNION { ?event bio:date ?date . FILTER regex(?date,'2010') } }

question.query: PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT DISTINCT ?artist ?artistname WHERE { ?track rdf:type mo:Track . ?track dc:title 'Over the Rainbow' . ?track foaf:maker ?artist . ?artist foaf:name ?artistname . }

question.string: Give me all songs on the album Abbey Road.
question.query: PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> SELECT DISTINCT ?track ?title WHERE { ?album mo:release_type mo:album . ?album dc:title 'Abbey Road' . ?album mo:track ?track . ?track dc:title ?title . }

question.string: What is the third song on the album In the Wee Small Hours?
question.keywords: third song, album, In the Wee Small Hours
question.query: PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> SELECT DISTINCT ?track ?title WHERE { ?album dc:title 'In the Wee Small Hours' . ?album mo:track ?track . ?track mo:trackNum '1' . ?track dc:title ?title . }

question.string: How many bands are called Air?
question.query: PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ?artist) WHERE { ?artist rdf:type mo:MusicGroup . ?artist foaf:name 'Air' . }

question.string: Did Elvis Presley record jazz albums?
question.query: PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> ASK WHERE { ?album rdf:type mo:Record . ?album foaf:maker ?artist . ?artist foaf:name 'Elvis Presley' . ?album dc:description 'jazz' . }

question.string: Which songs by Miles Davis are longer than 20 minutes?
question.query: PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX tl: <http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/timeline.owl#> SELECT DISTINCT ?track ?title WHERE { ?track dc:title ?title . ?track foaf:maker ?artist . ?artist foaf:name 'Miles Davis' . ?track tl:duration ?duration . FILTER( ?duration > 1200 ). }

question.string: Give me all members of The Muppets.
question.query: PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> SELECT DISTINCT ?artist ?artistname WHERE { ?band foaf:name 'The Muppets' . ?artist mo:member_of ?band. ?artist foaf:name ?artistname . }

question.string: Give me all siblings of Michael Jackson.
question.query: PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX rel: <http://purl.org/vocab/relationship/> SELECT DISTINCT ?artist ?artistname WHERE { ?artist foaf:name ?artistname . ?artist_2 foaf:name 'Michael Jackson' . ?artist rel:siblingOf ?artist_2 . }

question.string: Which albums contain interviews with Queen?
question.query: PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> SELECT DISTINCT ?album ?title WHERE { ?album mo:release_type mo:interview . ?album foaf:maker ?artist . ?artist foaf:name 'Queen' . ?album dc:title ?title . }

question.string: How many audiobooks by Tolkien are there?
question.query: PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ?album) WHERE { ?album mo:release_type mo:audiobook . ?album foaf:maker ?artist . ?artist foaf:name 'J.R.R. Tolkien' . }

question.string: Give me all soundtracks composed by John Williams.
question.query: PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> SELECT DISTINCT ?album ?albumname WHERE { ?album mo:release_type mo:soundtrack . ?album mo:composer ?artist . ?artist foaf:name 'John Williams' . ?album dc:title ?albumname . }

question.string: Which person recorded the most singles?
question.query: PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT ?artist ?artistname WHERE { ?album mo:release_type mo:single . ?album foaf:maker ?artist . ?artist rdf:type mo:SoloMusicArtist . ?artist foaf:name ?artistname . } GROUP BY ?artist ?artistname ORDER BY DESC(COUNT(?album)) LIMIT 1

question.string: When was Ludwig van Beethoven born?
question.query: PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX bio: <http://purl.org/vocab/bio/0.1/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT DISTINCT ?date WHERE { ?artist foaf:name 'Ludwig van Beethoven'. ?artist bio:event ?event . ?event rdf:type bio:Birth . ?event bio:date ?date . }

question.string: Who wrote the lyrics for West Side Story?
question.query: PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> SELECT DISTINCT ?artist ?artistname WHERE { ?album dc:title 'West Side Story' . ?album mo:lyricist ?artist . ?artist foaf:name ?artistname . }

question.string: Give me all Celldweller EPs.
question.query: PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> SELECT DISTINCT ?album ?title WHERE { ?album mo:release_type mo:ep . ?album foaf:maker ?artist . ?artist foaf:name 'Celldweller' . ?album dc:title ?title . }

question.string: What is the longest song by John Cage?
question.query: PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX tl: <http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/timeline.owl#> SELECT ?song ?songtitle WHERE { ?song tl:duration ?duration . ?song dc:title ?songtitle . ?song foaf:maker ?artist . ?artist foaf:name 'John Cage' . } ORDER BY DESC(?duration) LIMIT 1

question.string: Which compilations does the song Waterloo by ABBA appear on?
question.query: PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> SELECT DISTINCT ?album ?albumtitle WHERE { ?album dc:title ?albumtitle . ?album mo:release_type mo:compilation . ?album foaf:maker ?artist . ?artist foaf:name 'ABBA' . ?track dc:title 'Waterloo' . ?album mo:track ?track . }

question.string: When did Madonna and Guy Richie get divorced?
question.query: OUT OF SCOPE

question.string: Give me the spouses of all members of The Beatles.
question.query: PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX rel: <http://purl.org/vocab/relationship/> SELECT DISTINCT ?spouse ?spousename WHERE { ?band foaf:name 'The Beatles' . ?artist mo:member_of ?band . ?artist rel:spouseOf ?spouse . ?spouse foaf:name ?spousename . }

question.string: Are there bootleg recordings by Pink Floyd?
question.query: PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> ASK WHERE { ?album rdf:type mo:Record . ?album mo:release_status mo:bootleg . ?album foaf:maker ?artist . ?artist foaf:name 'Pink Floyd' . }

question.string: How many members does the largest group have?
question.query: PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> SELECT COUNT(?artist) AS ?number WHERE { ?artist mo:member_of ?band . } GROUP BY ?band ORDER BY DESC(?number) LIMIT 1

question.string: Which rock album has the most tracks?
question.query: PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> SELECT ?album ?title WHERE { ?album mo:release_type mo:album . ?album dc:description 'rock' . ?album dc:title ?title . ?album mo:track ?track . } GROUP BY ?album ?title ORDER BY DESC(COUNT(?track)) LIMIT 1

question.string: When was the daughter of Elvis Presley born?
question.query: PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX bio: <http://purl.org/vocab/bio/0.1/> PREFIX rel: <http://purl.org/vocab/relationship/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT DISTINCT ?date WHERE { ?artist foaf:name 'Elvis Presley' . ?artist rel:parentOf ?child . ?child bio:event ?event . ?event rdf:type bio:Birth . ?event bio:date ?date . }

question.string: How many EPs did Muse release?
question.query: PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ?album) WHERE { ?album mo:release_type mo:ep . ?artist foaf:name 'Muse' . ?album foaf:maker ?artist . }

question.string: Who did the vocals on the album Sabotage?
question.query: PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> SELECT DISTINCT ?singer ?name WHERE { ?album mo:release_type mo:album . ?album dc:title 'Sabotage' . ?album mo:singer ?singer . ?singer foaf:name ?name . }

question.string: How many artists were born in 1966?
Is there a group called Michael Jackson?
question.query: PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> ASK WHERE { ?artist rdf:type mo:MusicGroup . ?artist foaf:name 'Michael Jackson' . }

question.string: Which bands was Robbie Williams a member of?
question.query: PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> SELECT DISTINCT ?band ?bandname WHERE { ?artist foaf:name 'Robbie Williams' . ?artist mo:member_of ?band . ?band foaf:name ?bandname . }

question.string: Was John Lennon married?
question.query: PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX rel: <http://purl.org/vocab/relationship/> ASK WHERE { ?artist foaf:name 'John Lennon' . ?artist rel:spouseOf ?spouse . FILTER (BOUND(?spouse)) }

question.string: In which bands did Kurt Cobain play?
question.query: PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> SELECT DISTINCT ?band ?title WHERE { ?artist foaf:name 'Kurt Cobain' . ?artist mo:member_of ?band . ?band foaf:name ?title . }

question.string: Which bands released more than 100 singles?
question.query: PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT DISTINCT ?band ?bandname WHERE { ?band rdf:type mo:MusicGroup . ?band foaf:name ?bandname . ?album mo:release_type mo:single . ?album foaf:maker ?band . } GROUP BY ?band ?bandname HAVING (COUNT(?album) > 100 )

question.string: How many live albums did The Rolling Stones release?
question.keywords: live album, The Rolling Stones, release
question.query: PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ?album) WHERE { ?album rdf:type mo:Record . ?album mo:release_type mo:live . ?album foaf:maker ?artist . ?artist foaf:name 'The Rolling Stones' . }

question.string: Are there any live albums by the Beatles?
question.query: PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> ASK WHERE { ?album rdf:type mo:Record . ?album mo:release_type mo:live . ?album foaf:maker ?artist . ?artist foaf:name 'The Beatles' . }

question.string: How many soundtracks did Hans Zimmer compose?
question.query: PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ?album) WHERE { ?album rdf:type mo:Record . ?album mo:release_type mo:soundtrack . ?album foaf:maker ?artist . ?artist foaf:name 'Hans Zimmer' . }

question.string: When were The Vertigos founded?
question.query: PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX bio: <http://purl.org/vocab/bio/0.1/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT DISTINCT ?date WHERE { ?artist foaf:name 'The Vertigos'. ?artist bio:event ?event . ?event rdf:type bio:Birth . ?event bio:date ?date . }

question.string: Did Kurt Cobain have children?
question.query: PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX rel: <http://purl.org/vocab/relationship/> ASK WHERE { ?artist rel:parentOf ?child . ?child foaf:name ?name . ?artist foaf:name 'Kurt Cobain' . }

question.string: Who is the creator of the audiobook The Hobbit?
question.query: PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> SELECT DISTINCT ?creator ?creatorname WHERE { ?album mo:release_type mo:audiobook . ?album dc:title 'The Hobbit' . ?album foaf:maker ?creator . ?creator foaf:name ?creatorname . }

question.string: Give me the collaborations of Shakira.
question.query: PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX rel: <http://purl.org/vocab/relationship/> SELECT DISTINCT ?artist_2 ?artist_2_name WHERE { ?artist foaf:name 'Shakira' . ?artist rel:collaboratesWith ?artist_2 . ?artist_2 foaf:name ?artist_2_name . }

question.string: Who created the single The Girl Is Mine?
question.keywords: create, single, The Girl Is Mine
question.query: PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> SELECT DISTINCT ?artist ?name WHERE { ?album mo:release_type mo:single . ?album dc:title 'The Girl Is Mine' . ?album foaf:maker ?artist . ?artist foaf:name ?name . }

question.string: Give me all audiobooks by Paul Auster.
question.query: PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT DISTINCT ?album ?title WHERE { ?album rdf:type mo:Record . ?album mo:release_type mo:audiobook . ?album dc:title ?title . ?album foaf:maker ?artist . ?artist foaf:name 'Paul Auster' . }

question.string: How many jazz compilations are there?
question.query: PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ?album) WHERE { ?album rdf:type mo:Record . ?album mo:release_type mo:compilation . ?album dc:description 'jazz' . }

question.string: How many children did John Lennon have?
question.query: PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX rel: <http://purl.org/vocab/relationship/> SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ?child) WHERE { ?artist foaf:name 'John Lennon' . ?artist rel:parentOf ?child . }

question.string: Which members of The Beatles were married more than once?
question.keywords: The Beatles, member, married, more than once
question.query: PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX rel: <http://purl.org/vocab/relationship/> SELECT DISTINCT ?artist ?artistname WHERE { ?band foaf:name 'The Beatles' . ?artist mo:member_of ?band . ?artist foaf:name ?artistname . ?artist rel:spouseOf ?spouse . } GROUP BY ?artist ?artistname HAVING (COUNT(?spouse) > 1)

question.string: Show me all live albums by Nat King Cole.
question.query: PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT DISTINCT ?album ?title WHERE { ?album rdf:type mo:Record . ?album mo:release_type mo:live . ?album dc:title ?title . ?album foaf:maker ?artist . ?artist foaf:name 'Nat King Cole' . }

question.string: Who was born on the same day as Frank Sinatra?
question.query: PREFIX bio: <http://purl.org/vocab/bio/0.1/> PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT DISTINCT ?artist_2 ?artist_2_name WHERE { ?artist foaf:name 'Frank Sinatra' . ?artist bio:event ?event . ?event rdf:type bio:Birth . ?event bio:date ?date . ?artist_2 foaf:name ?artist_2_name . ?artist_2 bio:event ?event_2 . ?event_2 rdf:type bio:Birth . ?event_2 bio:date ?date . FILTER (!sameTerm(?artist_2,?artist)) }

question.string: Since when does Scattered Earth exist?
question.query: PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX bio: <http://purl.org/vocab/bio/0.1/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT DISTINCT ?date WHERE { ?artist foaf:name 'Scattered Earth'. ?artist bio:event ?event . ?event rdf:type bio:Birth . ?event bio:date ?date . }
